episodes.synopsis: Disney gives five fairy tales a makeover in this collection that finds Mickey climbing a giant beanstalk, visiting the Middle Ages and more.
episodes.title: Play All Five: Vol. 1

episodes.synopsis: Mickey and his friends Donald and Goofy climb a beanstalk to rescue the lovely singing harp from the giant to restore happiness to the Happy Valley.
episodes.title: Mickey And The Beanstalk

episodes.synopsis: Mickey plays a tailor who swats seven flies with one blow. The king, thinks Mickey has killed seven giants and appoints him to kill the giant who is terrorizing the town. Mickey learns his reward is to marry the princess Minnie.
episodes.title: Brave Little Tailor

episodes.synopsis: In telling the story to his nephews, Mickey is Gulliver, who is bound on the shore by the Lilliputians. But when he saves the town from a huge spider, Mickey becomes the hero of the day.
episodes.title: Gulliver Mickey

episodes.synopsis: When Mickey has an outlandish dream and goes through a mirror he has to fight a deck of cards with the aid of an electric fan - and that's just the beginning of his fantasical adventure!
episodes.title: Thru The Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Mickey must do some quick thinking and don a few disguises to foil Pete, the train conductor, who wants him off the train for concealing Pluto.
episodes.title: Mr. Mouse Takes A Trip

video.title: Disney Animation Collection: Vol. 1: Mickey and the Beanstalk
video.synopsis: Mickey and the rest of the gang star in this collection of stories inspired by fairy tales, including "Gulliver Mickey" and "Mr. Mouse Takes a Trip."
